sect4.title: mktemp
sect4.para: mktemp creates temporary files in a secure manner for use in scripts.

sect4.title: tempfile
sect4.para: tempfile creates temporary files in a less secure manner than mktemp. It is installed for backwards-compatibility.

sect4.title: http-get
sect4.para: http-get is a script that takes advantage of a little known feature of Bash called "net redirection". It is used to download from websites without using any third-party programs.

sect4.title: iana-net
sect4.para: iana-net uses the http-get to simplify the process of procuring IANA's services and protocols configuration files.
